anforande.avsnittsrubrik: Svar p√• interpellation 2021/22:333 om bristande kvalitet i vuxenutbildningen
anforande.anforandetext: Before I give the floor to Mr Roger Haddad of the Liberal party for his closing remarks I would like to welcome my colleague, the Speaker of the Walloon Parliament, and his delegation to the Swedish Parliament. They are our guests today. We bid them a warm welcome although the weather in Sweden is much colder than in Belgium. You are most welcome to the Swedish Parliament!
